reviews.review:
Mein erstes negatives Review auf Steam und es ist hochverdient.
Die Idee klingt erstmal ganz witzig: Vier Überlebende sind mit einem Killer eingesperrt und versuchen verzweifelt zu entkommen. Bei solchen asymmetrischen Spielen ist das Balancing das A und O.

Und das ist hier kompletter Rotz und ganz großer Scheiß!

Das kleinere Probleme:
Sogar auf der Killerseite merkt man es schon, dass es nicht funktioniert. Entweder hat man vier zufällig zusammengewürfelte Hansel, die wie planlose Hühner durch die Gegend rennen und eine (relativ) leichte Beute sind. Oder man spielt gegen ein eingespieltes Team, wo man mit Glück überhaupt einen erwischt (was längst nicht gesagt ist) und dann diesen zwangsweise becampen muss, will man überhaupt einen Kill haben.

Das größere (und entscheidende) Problem:
Richtig Übel wird es aber bei der Rolle der Überlebenden. Da diese tatsächlich wehrlos gegen den Killer sind (die Funzel-Taschenlampen sind ein Witz und absolut unzuverlässig), ist dem Trolling und sonstigem Spielmissbrauch Tor und Tür geöffnet. Ein Killer kann dich also in einer Situation gefangen halten, wo du weder stirbst, noch entkommen kannst . Und zwar so lange er will! (Und ggf. mit Hilfe der definitiv beschränkten "Teamkameraden", die sein Spiel nicht verstehen.)
Also so lange bis zum A) Ragequit, B) Suizid oder C) Einweisung in die Klapse. 
Ich empfehle den Ragequit, das andere geht doch arg ins Geld. Allerdings wird dieser auch durch das Spiel bestraft, was die nicht mehr vorhandene Motivation komplett erledigt.

Also kurz: Kauft es nicht! Auch nicht im Angebot! Auch nicht geschenkt!
Macht mit eurer Zeit etwas sinnvolleres. Vielleicht ein Buch lesen, Masturbieren oder Hundewelpen im Fluss ertränken. Das alles raubt euch zumindest nicht derartig den Willen zu Leben, wie dieses Spiel.

(Kleine Ausnahme:
Wenn ihr drei oder vier Freunde habt, die dieses Spiel spielen, dann mag es wohl als Partyspiel taugen. Wenn einer den Killer spielt und man mit dem während der Runde rumalbert, kann es vielleicht witzig sein. Voraussgesetzt, er kann seine RL-Probleme draußen lassen...)

it has a lot of issues and those issues grind the joy of playing as game becomes fairly disadvantages towards survivors. i am not saying i am expert on this but i think some features must  change in order to make this game more enjoyable. 
- wiggling takes too long to save yourself so it has no purpose.
-sabotaging hooks  has no purpose. never seen anyone doing and having a net gain on the matter. the fact that it also makes noise even after successful checks.  
-tool boxes does very little.
after some amoun of time  i put in this game. it started to look like gamble for the most part. game decides whatever is going to happen to you rather than yourself.
ps: after few more hours all i can say don't buy this game until it has a a balanced gameplay, pay half if it is possible because you'll enjoy half of the matches you play. half is just waste of time.
pretty good job so far

Dead by Daylight is easily the best asymmetrical horror game you can currently buy. As you get better, things can become more frustrating over time. You'll have to learn to accept getting a killer staring you down on a hook, or 4 survivors in a group t-bagging you at the exit gates. These things will happen to you no matter what.

If you have 4 other friends to do private games with, this game will be extremely fun and probably never frustrating whatsoever.

I highly recommend DBD overall. It's a game that you really can't get a similar feeling from with any other game, especially with all of the cool licenses they have at hand.

Buy it with no DLC and see if you like it. You should likely know if you enjoy it easily in the first two hours. If you don't enjoy it, you can easily refund it.

Пожалуй это самая лучшая онлайн игра за сурвов и маньяков. Хоть цель игры всегда одна и та-же (починить генераторы и свалить) эта игра никогда не надоедат своим разнообразием и вводом длс! Кстати все длс можно получить и игровым путем, и это значительный плюс в игре! К тому-же если вы при деньгах, длс не так уж и дорого стоят, всего за 175 рублей вы получаете и сурва и мана! В общем игра отличная! Всем рекомендую!

Katiller(killer) kaçmaya çalışanlara(survivor) göre biraz daha güçlü açıkçası. Kaçanlar çok pasif kalıyorlar ancak grup olarak hareket ederseniz katil yakınınızdayken güçlü oluyorsunuz onun dışında da organize hareket etmek zorundasınız. Katillerde gözünmezlik, ışınlanma gibi insanüstü gücü olan katiller varken kaçan tayfa da böyle şeyler yok. Anca fener, ilk yardım çantası, alet çantası gibi yardımcı ögeler var. Oyun içerisinde ki palet düşürme 360 taktiği gibi şeyler de sadece katili yavaşlatıyor. Kaçmak için bize fırsat oluşturuyor yani yetenek gerek ama katilin yakalamak için uğraşmasına gerek yok. Tek eli pipisinde vurup kırıp asıyor. Buda oyunu kaçan kişi olarak biraz daha zora sokuyor ve dengeyi bozuyor açıkçası. Ya katillerden bu güçleri kaldrmaları gerek, nerflemeleri yada kaçan şahıslara da güçler gelmeli. Ben kaldırılması taraftarıyım zaten katil yeterince kovalarsa daha hızlı kovalamaya başlıyor survivorun katile karşı karşı yapması gereken kaçmakken arayı kapatmaya yarayan bu katil özellikleri survivorunda tek yapabileceği şeyi oyundan siliyor. Katiller törpülmeli.

Ayrıca ehr survivorun kanayan yarası olan kampçılara da bir çözüm gelmeli. Adam hiç bir şey yapmasa bile 2 kişi banko ölüyor. Ben takım arkadaşımın, kader yoldaşımın acı içinde öldüğünü görmek zorunda mıyım? Bu nasıl bir caniliktir ne tür bir işkence çeşididir? Sonuç olarak camperlara yani kampçılara bir çözüm gelmeli

When you play survivor:
-Teammates will fail skillchecks while healing you or repairing then tactically run away so you will be found and killed instead.
-Teammates will die like a cattle trying to save hooked one from Leatherface with chainsaw ready or under Exposed (both 1 hit = dead) debuff.
-Teammates will completely ignore you being hooked and do objectives while you buying them time dying on hook.
-Teammates will repeatedly unhook you in front of the killer (farming points on you) so you will be downed and killed in seconds.
-Teammates will lead killer to you or show your location with their flashlights so once again they can do stuff while you die.
[b]>> In summary - Sociopath Simulator[/b]

When you play Killer:
-If you killed noone, but got plenty of points and ranked up in process - you will be called noob in game chat after the game.
-If you killed 3 or all 4 of them - you will be called noob because used "cheating" (effective) perks and tactics.
-If you killed all 4 of them without any perks (by forgetting to add them before game lol) - you will be called lucky noob.
-If you killed the one and only guy who teabagged and distracted you all game to give him a valuable lesson - you will be called noob anyway.
-If you killed the overconfident guy who played worse than behaved - he will probably also say something about your mom too.
[b]>> In summary - Noob Killer Simulator[/b]

This game taught me that no matter how good you play and what you do, in the end there will always be guys expressing anger, hate, toxicity and all possible options for gay and racism insults. You may think that the majority of its playerbase consists of inadequate kids and here comes the most scary part of this "horror" game - these are adults, living next door and surrounding you in your everyday life.

살인마가 재밌긴한데 만약에 살구형영상보고 나도 이정도는할수있지! 라며 사서하는것은 비추이다 살구형은 그냥 쌉고인물이고 우리는 청정수이기때문에 똑같은 플레이를 절때할수없기때문에 그냥 즐기려고만하려고 사는것을 추천한다 몇번씩 살구형처럼 토구들고 위로 도끼던져서 맞추려는애들이 조금씩보인다 (제발 살구형보고 따라하지않았으면 좋겠네요) 그리고 살인마농락하다가 자기실수로 죽으면 랜뽑하는애들도 종종보이는데 뭐같은 비매짓은 제발하지말자 자기가 당할껄생각하고 게임했음좋겠다

I really love this game, it fun and gives a nice mix of thrill and excitement, either you play as a killer or survivor. also to play as/from both perspectives gives it a good variation and different feeling, depending on what side you choose to play. what more fun it that as you play with other ppl online, you never now what to expect and some time some really interesting stuff can happen too.
재미있고 다 좋은데 가끔씩 번역 안되어있는 부분이 거슬린다.

정말 완벽한 게임입니다 살인마가 빨핑일경우 단돈 21.000원으로 오버워치에있는 트레이서의 점멸과 시간역행과  자리야의 중력자탄 겐지의 질풍참을  체험하실 수 있습니다. 심지어 이게임에 담긴 철학을 알 수 있는데요 개발자 메튜는 정말 신과같은 존재입니다
이런게임을 만들다니 이런서버와 정말 신 그자체입니다. 나는 초핑인데 살인마가 빨핑이라는이유하나로 오버워치를 강제로 시키고
심지어 나가기 싫었는데 강퇴도 되더라구요 살인마가 빨핑이면 강퇴당합니다 여러분 기억하세요 빨핑 중요합니다 메모하세요
일단 개발자 메튜를 정말 사랑하는 한 게임의 유저로서 정말 대단한거같습니다. 단돈 21.000 당신도 경험할수 있습니다.

Auch nach 1000 Stunden macht das Spiel noch spaß, auch wenn es hier und da ein Paar bugs gibt und das Spiel teilweise etwas unbalanciert geregelt ist und manche "Balance Änderungen" eher zum Vorteil einer bestimmten Spielerseite beiträgt.  Es empfiehlt sich dieses Spiel mit Freunden bzw Leuten, die man kennt oder über das Spiel kennenlernt zu spielen, um den Spielspaß zu steigern. manche Killer sind vielleicht  "unfair" durch beispielsweise Camping oder gezieltes tunneling. Jedoch gibt es auch eine toxische Seite auf der Überlebenden Seite, die Beispielsweise die Killer in einem hilflosen Moment z.B. durch anleuchten während sie eine Pallette zerstören komplett auf die nerven gehen können.

Fazit: Jede Seite hat seine Vor- und Nachteile und auch toxische Seiten.

所以連線品質非常不穩定, 希望能改由官方設置伺服器並提供穩定的品質

怎么说呢，和朋友一起玩了几个小时这个游戏。刚刚开始玩的时候，觉得真的好玩。特别是和朋友开黑，很有意思。那一天弄到了一个不错的紫色技能，任务也都完成了，人物也升到了十五级。当时觉得这个游戏真的很棒，和朋友一起玩可以玩一年。然后第二天，我再次打开了这个游戏……哈？我的技能呢？我的等级呢？我的段位呢？一朝回到解放前，一下子什么也没有了，一下子心态就炸了。如果不是朋友还要我陪，这个游戏我已经给退了。
总而言之，我要来这里发泄一下我的情绪，不然我真的很不高兴。
2.4.0にアップデートしてからキラーサバイバー両方とも重い

从六月份入坑玩到现在已经500个小时了，我很喜欢玩这个游戏无论是屠夫还是人类，刚开始玩这个游戏，你会迷路，找不到发电机在哪里甚至会被吓死（反正我是这样的），一次次追逐你始终不能逃脱魔爪，一次次上钩后你都尝试挣扎，却不知道迎接你的便是恶灵的尖爪，刚入坑的你可能不知道你只有三次百分之四的几率能自己跳下来，一次次成为祭品,让我产生了退坑的想法。后来对地图熟悉之后，开始玩屠夫，第一次玩的是护士，啥都不会，大门开了，就挂上去一个人，守尸最后还被怀表救走了。我意识到我可能不适合这个游戏,就选择了离开.一次偶然，让我看到了解说拒绝，他带给我很多的欢乐，教会了我很多新玩法，这时的我才认识到这款游戏该怎么样玩，我就重新开始玩了，那一天通宵打上了13段，我觉得对于一个新手来说已经算是不错了，我就对这个游戏产生了感情，我拉拢我的朋友来玩这款游戏，他们都很讨厌，拒绝了我,不知道是什么原因，一个人都没留下来，这是我最不能理解的。在这500小时里面结交了许多新朋友，遇到了许多bug，以及杀机四连等一系列的问题，但是这些问题根本就阻止不了我，不可能让我对这个游戏产生厌恶的感情，-渐渐的人类跑上了红段，屠夫也爬上了红段，玩人类，带上了魂牵，拿起了光剑，玩护士，带上了鹰眼，打上了四趴，虽然人类已被削弱了（跑动不回复疲劳值）但是能溜5台发电机的人还在，留下的人才是强者，紧接着就是2.3版本的改动，倒地自摸上限提升到百分之95.无疑增加了四趴的难度。希望四趴玩家也能度过这次难关吧！
Pretty good job so far!))

I really like the concept of DBD. It's the coop version of Outlast (if you ever played Outlast, you know what I mean). This is probably the only time I like a coop game where I have to lvl up. Everything is more or less well balanced, just need to use the perks and environment to your advantage. And that's where the negative points come in, the tutorial is crap. Took me a couple of hours (and youtube) to figure out the Skill Check and other game mechanics. Make a Tutorial where you can pick what you want to practice. And, of cource, it's a P2P game. Between disconnects, lag switching and bad pings, all online games need to be client/server based and not P2P... the game will be better for it... get servers... you reduce cheating and other disconnect issues.
All and all, I still recommend DBD.

为什么总是显示黎明杀机已停止工作？！卸载重新安装都没用！搞什么鬼
游戏可玩性很高，不要听差评的乱说话。"《黎明杀机》是一款小格局低成本的恐怖生存多人对抗游戏，制作商巧妙融入了一恰到好处的B级恐怖片气氛，设计出规则简单却令人肾上腺素飙升的恐怖生存竞赛体验。不论是化身杀手追捕幸存者，还是作为幸存者逃出生天，两者之间独特的体验都令人难忘。同时也是一款非常适合叫上亲朋好友开黑互斗的小品级游戏。"真的挺不错的。
